channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed

item.title: Hedge-fund giant Man says assets reach record levels
item.description: Man Group, the world‚Äôs largest publicly traded hedge fund manager, on Friday said investment gains helped its assets under management grow by 17.5% in the first half to record highs of $178.2 billion.

item.title: Venezuela‚Äôs Maduro bids for a third term in power ‚Äî as U.S., Brazil warn over need for free election
item.description: Venezuela's Nicolas Maduro will seek his third term in office on Sunday in a vote that's regarded as the country's most open contest in more than a decade.

item.title: Dow futures pop more than 100 points as investors prepare for Fed‚Äôs preferred inflation gauge: Live updates
item.description: The major averages are poised to end the week with losses as investors dump megacap tech and AI-related names.

item.title: Market bubbles expand longer than many expect. But this metric shows valuations will matter.
item.description: Valuation may not matter in the short term but it eventually does, says this fund manager

item.title: France's high-speed rail network hit by arson attacks, canceling trains ahead of Olympics
item.description: SNCF said in a statement its network had experienced several concurrent attacks on Thursday night, with fire damaging its facilies.

item.title: Liquidation of crowded trades so far is healthy ‚Äî but these levels must hold, says Bank of America
item.description: Expectations over Fed rate cuts and a presidential victory by former President Donald Trump are what‚Äôs behind a liquidation of the most crowded trades that so far is healthy, says a Bank of America strategist.

item.title: Kamala Harris debuts official TikTok account as presidential campaign picks up
item.description: Kamala Harris debuted an official TikTok account on Thursday, underscoring the social broadcasting app's importance to the 2024 presidential campaign.

item.title: Novo Nordisk's Wegovy wins EU backing for reducing heart risks
item.description: Novo Nordisk's Wegovy has received backing from the EU's medical regulator to expand the weight loss drug's use to reducing the rise of serious heart events.

item.description: ‚ÄúIs it common for entire estates to be left to the second spouse instead of being divided among the children?‚Äù

item.title: GM reveals new Chevy Corvette with 1,000-plus horsepower and record top speed
item.description: The ZR1 joins what GM is calling the "Corvette family," leveraging the reputation of the quintessential American sports car to boost revenue and sales.

item.title: European stocks rise as global selloff eases; NatWest up 6%
item.description: European markets were higher on Friday as the global selloff seen this week eases.

item.title: OpenAI announces a search engine called SearchGPT; Alphabet shares dip
item.description: OpenAI announced a prototype of its SearchGPT search engine on Thursday.

item.title: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix to build $6.8 billion chip plant in South Korea
item.description: SK Hynix's plant will be in the Yongin Semiconductor Cluster where the South Korean government is looking to build a massive complex of chip operations.
